articles.title: New Haven police chief abruptly retires after theft allegations, mayor says
articles.description:
The mayor said Chief Karl Jacobson admitted he took money from a city fund that compensates confidential informants for helping police solve crimes.

articles.title: Trump says the U.S. ‘needs’ Greenland for Arctic security. Here’s why.
articles.description:
Greenland is a self-governing territory of Denmark, a longtime U.S. ally that has rejected Trump’s overtures.
